articles.author: Matt Novak
articles.title: FBI Warns Americans to Start Using Encrypted Messaging Apps - Gizmodo
articles.description: It's all about protecting against China, but there's the added benefit of protecting against Trump.
articles.content: America’s top cybersecurity and law enforcement officials made a coordinated push Tuesday to raise awareness about cyber threats from foreign actors in the wake of an intrusion of U.S. telecom equipm… [+3684 chars]
